altTitles.ja-ro: Boku wa Tomodachi ga Sukunai - Koushiki Anthology Comic
Boku wa Tomodachi ga Sukunai Anthology
Boku wa Tomodachi ga Sukunai Official Anthology Comic

altTitles.ja: 僕は友達が少ない公式アンソロジーコミック

description.en:
An anthology of Boku wa Tomodachi ga Sukunai by various mangaka.

---
**Volume 1**
Cover: [Mizoguchi Keiji](https://mangadex.org/author/accaa73c-0040-4926-8b5e-ff43edf0289f)
Color illustrations: [Youta](https://mangadex.org/author/0deb4fc2-516d-4aea-8c71-f20c6afdb623), [okiura](https://mangadex.org/author/291aa6c2-4908-463f-82d3-76e6e4c605ec), [karory](https://mangadex.org/author/2de90633-4afd-4027-a3b5-88bef77d61ab), [Higa Yukari](https://mangadex.org/author/b0f9c45c-7c88-4dd3-a87d-cb22167a5c94)

**Chapters**:
1. **Me and Slave and Blue Day** by Itachi
2. **You can't make friends if you don't enter the tiger's den** by Ayakura Juu
3. **If you want to get friends, you need a strategy to get their stomachs first!?** by nini
4. **A Certain Aviator's Reminiscences** by Haruno Tomoya
5. **Femininity Deviation** by pun2
6. **Boku wa Tomodachi ga Sukunai+ Preview** by Taguchi Shouichi & Harukawa Misaki
7. **You did it! Neighbor's Club!** by Shirabi & Kazahana Chiruwo
8. **Kobato will do her best.** by Takei Ooki
9. **How to Make Friends with Karaoke** by Atto
10. **I shall return to the Rika Room!** by Hotaru Takana & Piro Shiki
11. **A Tragedy of the Potato Chips of Darkness** by Takamura Masaya
12. **Rose-colored Youth?** by Toru Kei
13. **Telephone Shocking** by Toru Kei
14. **Romance of the Three Kingdoms is a Loner's Achievement** by Shibamine Takashi
15. **If an angel could become a smile...** by Rokushou Kokuu
16. **Swimsuit Exhibition** by Uonuma Yuu
17. **The Melancholy of Kashiwazaki Sena** by Shiranami Sui
18. **I, Yukimura, Will Become a Samurai** by meet neet.
19. **Kobato, Age 16** by Sugano Manami
20. **Let's go to a beauty salon** by Yamada Koutarou & Miura Isao
---
**Volume 2**
Cover: [CUTEG](https://mangadex.org/author/7cf2ec07-fe50-4040-b4e6-e0f043a831e3)
Color illustration: Runa (屡那), [Sayori](https://mangadex.org/author/efde5bbc-b895-4331-9078-8c82b6a1bf7b), Bankoku Ayuya

**Chapters**:
1. **This ain't no vampire!** by Hasemi Ryou
2. **Sena→Sena?!** by Sanshoku Amido.
3. **We Had Too Much Free Time, So We Played With Our Hair** by Ichiri
4. **Universe in the Mind** by Kouji
5. **Gosurorinjinbu!** kona (Konayama Kata)
6. **A Girl's Heart** by Shouno Kotaro
7. **Regrettable Photoshoot** by 100 Yen Locker
8. *Sister vs. Sister* (シスターvs.シスター) by Natsuki Yuu
9. *Bath Time Trouble* (バスタイムトラブル) by Komoda
10. *Getabako no Tegami wa Bara no Kaori!?* (下駄箱の手紙は薔薇の薫り!?) by Nullken
11. *Onegai My Sena-sama☆* (おねがい マイ星奈様☆) by Xi Daisei (Daise)
12. *Ha wo Nai (Boku wa Real Fight wo Tomenai)* (はをない（僕はリアルファイトをとめない）) by Yukiwo
13. *Hentai de Tensai demo Shoujo Desukara!* (変態で天才でも少女ですから!) by Tsuzuri
14. *Yaranai Zen yori Yaru Gizen!* (やらない善よりやる偽善!) by Akiduki Akina
15. *Tatoeba, Sonna Nichijou.* (例えば、そんな日常。) by Yuizaki Kazuya
16. *Rinki Ouhen mo Tanin tomo Yoki Kankei wo* (臨機応変も他人とも善き関係を) by Mitsu King
17. *Yukimura, Kaizou Keikaku!* (幸村、改造計画!) by Choboraunyopomi
---
**Volume 3**
Cover: [Yuugen](https://mangadex.org/author/bb5f6354-eebb-4e6e-9d38-a7ff6818e665)
Color illustration: [Shirabi](https://mangadex.org/author/e942a741-ea9c-400c-8513-51bb1f0610de), [Kasuga Ayumu](https://mangadex.org/author/82c4316a-f764-4e20-a563-7e6dcfee6ac9), [Ningen](https://mangadex.org/author/8f8591be-db42-49b9-b5f3-49cf9eb90647), [Yoshida Morohe](https://mangadex.org/author/072d5e96-ff44-44c7-90b4-d03f59225b09)

**Chapters**:
1. *Tenshi to Akuma to Lunchtime* (天使と悪魔とランチタイム) by Tiv
2. *Batsu Game* (罰ゲーム) by Hisasi
3. *Sena x Yozora* (星奈×夜空) by Hijiki
4. *Taberarenai nara Tatakatte Shimaeba Ii Jyanai.* (食べられないなら闘ってしまえばいいじゃない。) by Murasaki Hisato
5. *Tobikome! Rinjinmura* (とびこめ! りんじん村) by Nariie Shinichirou (Naruse Yoshiki)
6. *Haganai!* (はがないっ!) by Kon Takuto
7. *An-chan to Issho!* (あんちゃんといっしょ!) by Kagisora Tomiyaki
8. *Ganbare Sumeragi-san* (がんばれすめらぎさん) by Yoshioka Kimitake
9. *Kisekae Yukimura-kun* (着せ替え幸村くん) by Aoki Mutsumi
10. *Hasegawa-ke no Kyuujitsu* (羽瀬川家の休日) by rin
11. *Irekawarinjin-bu* (いれかわりんじんぶ) by Kino Konoki
12. *Seikimatsu Nazo Inryousui Densetsu: Kodaka no Ken* (世紀末謎飲料水伝説 小鷹の件) by Take Shinobu
13. *Tanoshii Rinjin-bu* (楽しい隣人部) by Gin (Ishizuchi Ginko)
14. *Yozora x Pudding x Sena* (夜空xプリンx星奈) by Mukunoki Nanatsu
15. *Nuigurumi wa Hisoka ni Warau* (ぬいぐるみは密かに嗤う) by Minazuki Shinobu
16. *Otoko to Otoko no Love Game!?* (男と男のラブゲーム!?) by Nakamura Kira
17. *Futari no ☆Omoiyari* (ふたりの☆おもいやり) by Shagasuku (しゅがすく)
18. *Rui wa Tomo wo Yoba... nai?* (類は友を呼ば...ない?) by Kuro no Miki
19. *Tsuru to Peta* (つるとペタ) by Shouji Ayumu
20. *Bokura wa Purikura mo Torenai (´ ・ω・｀)* (僕らはプリクラも撮れない(´ ・ω・｀)) by Mori Misaki
21. *Virtual Osaka Natsu no Jin!* (ヴァーチャル大坂夏の陣!) by bomi & Kiurian
22. *Yume wo Mita Ano Hi Bokutachi wa* (夢を見たあの日 僕たちは) by Sakayama Shinta
